content: ** direct link to the entire free pattern reprinted in the errata pdf 2 ** as found on the crochet forum 1 people are having issues with the pattern - and the way around it is to let customer service know who can then email you a pdf of the pattern with revision **sizes ** * to fit 28-30 32-34 36-38 inch bust **materials ** * 5 balls #12 black * 4 balls #926 bridal white * 3 balls each #65 warm teal #486 navy and #175 warm blue * 1 ball each #325 tangerine and #423 maize * size d/3/3 25 crochet hook x-small * size f/5/3 75 crochet hook small * size g/6/4mm crochet hook medium **gauge ** * size d hook 11 half_double_crochet = 2 inches 5 half_double_crochet row = 1 inch * size f hook 9 half_double_crochet = 2 inches 4 half_double_crochet row = 1 inch * size g hook 4 half_double_crochet = 1 inch 3 half_double_crochet row = 1 inch 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/crochet-magazine/136905/1-25 2 http //www crochetmagazine com/corrections/pdfs/22113_errata pdf
